Record.ClassificationPath: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Genetic Diseases, Inborn/Anemia, Hemolytic, Congenital/Anemia, Hemolytic, Congenital Nonspherocytic
Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Anemia/Anemia, Hemolytic/Anemia, Hemolytic, Congenital/Anemia, Hemolytic, Congenital Nonspherocytic
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: Any one of a group of congenital hemolytic anemias in which there is no abnormal hemoglobin or spherocytosis and in which there is a defect of glycolysis in the erythrocyte. In some cases, pyruvate kinase deficiency has been demonstrated; in other cases, glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase deficiency has been demonstrated.
